## ðŸ”’ The Bitcoin Chronicles - A.0 - Book 0.7 - When Scarcity Became Moral

Scarcity was never merely economic. It has always been the boundary that turns choice into responsibility. Bitcoin reintroduces scarcity not as punishment, but as moral structure.

tags: ðŸ”’ The Bitcoin Chronicles - A.0 - Book 0.7 - When Scarcity Became Moral
Scarcity was never merely economic. It has always been the boundary that turns choice into responsibility. Bitcoin reintroduces scarcity not as punishment, but as moral structure.
